Text: I remember this game. It was fun. I did glitch where  you fly on a grenade against a wall all the time in that game but the hackers ruined the online play so I just hacked to not die from them flying around and shooting rapidfire bazookas and skyrunning etc which made it unwholesomely fun since I couldn\'t die. If I turned it off they pwnd me.

Hey people!! 
This game isn't MOH Heroes 2, is MOH Heroes 1, the first game.
